productDetails: A sleek and ergonomic wireless mouse with a 2-year battery life.
A durable mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and programmable keys.
A high-resolution 27-inch monitor with a 144Hz refresh rate and HDR support.
A portable 1TB external hard drive with USB 3.0 connectivity and fast data transfer speeds.
Comfortable over-ear headphones with active noise-cancelling technology and 30 hours of battery life.
